name: Flashlight Free
description: Small, light weight bright, easy to use free flashlight application that doesnt require any special permissions to use. No sneaky ads, no banner ads, no kidding.  - Instant on, uses cameras bright flash - No annoying sounds - No annoying ads - No special permissions - Works on 99% of devices - Free!  Make a shortcut of this app on your home screen and always have a one click flashlight available.  Enjoy this free flash light application with the brightest torch available on the market.
